text: @JaniceDean @usatodayopinion @NYGovCuomo I thought the whole point in President Trump placing the five medical places and bringing in that huge ship was to have hospital beds for Covid-19 patients. All other patients were to use one of the other six designated medical facilities. Didn’t the nursing home object ?
